text:
Philippe Nahon (; 24 December 1938 – 19 April 2020) was a French actor. He was born in Paris. His best known roles were in "High Tension", "I Stand Alone" and in "Calvaire". He also starred as the nameless butcher in three movies by Gaspar Noé – "Carne", "I Stand Alone," and "Irréversible" (cameo).
Nahon died of COVID-19 in Paris on 19 April 2020, aged 81.
